text: Hrozný is a surname, with affinities to the Russian word Grozny. Notable people with the surname include: * Bedřich Hrozný (1879–1952), Czech orientalist and linguist (for whom asteroid 5946 Hrozný is named)NASA database entry * Vyacheslav Hrozny (born 1956), Ukrainian soccer coach == References == Category:Czech-language surnames Category:Ukrainian-language surnames
title: Hrozný
